property.name: ltd.qubit.commons.mime.MimeRepository.rebuild
property.description: Whether to rebuild the MIME-type repository on start-up.

property.name: ltd.qubit.commons.mime.MimeRepository.save
property.description: Whether to save the MIME-type registry after rebuilding the repository.

property.name: ltd.qubit.commons.mime.MimeRepository.serialization
property.description: The absolute pathname of the file where to store the serialized MIME-type repository. Note that the variable substitution field "${user.home}" is used in the value, which indicates the "user.home" property value in the System properties registry get by Java.

property.name: ltd.qubit.commons.mime.MimeRepository.database
property.description: Specifies the resource name of the MIME-type database. It could be either a string (which indicates a Java resource name), a URL, or a local file system path. If it is a string indicating a resource name, the resource muse be found in the Java's class path.
